Corrigendum 
To Circular no. 28/2006 dated 4.12.2006 
 
Subject   : - Airport Design 
In continuation of this Bureau AVSEC Circular No. 28/2006 dated 4.12.2006, 
the following  paragraph shall be inserted after paragraph 3 of the said Circular and 
shall be implemented accordingly by all airport operators with immediate effect: 
4.   It is difficult to lay down hard and fast requirements for security design as 
each facility/building/airport will be different, with different design themes and 
parameters, and will incorporate different methods of construction and 
materials. However, with regard to civil aviation facilities, there are certain 
design fundamentals that should be taken into consideration. Detailed 
guidance is provided in Appendices 2 to 6 of Vol.3 Doc.8973 of ICAO.
